subject: Belligerents
object: Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia, Yugoslavia, SAO Krajina, SAO Eastern Slavonia, Baranja and Western Syrmia, SAO Western Slavonia, Croatia

subject: Commanders and leaders
object: Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia - Veljko Kadijević, Blagoje Adžić; Slobodan Milošević; Croatia - Franjo Tuđman, Gojko Šušak, Martin Špegelj, Anton Tus

subject: Units involved
object: Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia - Yugoslav Ground Forces, Yugoslav Air Force, Yugoslav Navy, Republic of Serbia Territorial Defense, Republic of Montenegro Territorial Defense, Serbian Guard, Serb Volunteer Guard, White Eagles; Croatian National Guard (until November 1991), Croatian Army (from November 1991), Croatian Police, Croatian Navy, Croatian Defence Forces

subject: Strength
object: September 1991 - 145,000 troops, 1,100 tanks, 700 APCs, 1,980 artillery pieces

subject: Strength
object: September 1991 - 58,000 troops; January 1992 - 155,772 troops, 216 tanks, 127 APCs, 1,108 artillery pieces
